dcterms:description: The ASVspoof 2019 dataset aims to determine whether the advances in text-to-speech and voice conversion technology pose increased threat to automatic speaker verification and the reliability of spooofing countermeasures. It consists of bona fide speech trails collected from the VCTK corpus, and spooofing attack trials synthesized by text-to-speech, voice conversion, or replay.
dcterms:title: ASVspoof 2019

dcterms:creator: Joon Son Chung
Arsha Nagrani
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: VoxCeleb2 is a benchmark dataset for speaker verification, containing audio clips collected from YouTube. It includes a total of 1,092,009 utterances from 5,994 speakers.
dcterms:title: VoxCeleb2

dcterms:creator: Junichi Yamagishi
Christophe Veaux
Kirsten MacDonald
dcterms:description: The VCTK corpus is an English multi-speaker corpus designed for the CSTR voice cloning toolkit. It contains recordings of English speech from multiple speakers.
dcterms:title: VCTK corpus
